resources.string: Salt Lake City Tour Guide
No Description Given
Food
Theatre
Music
Miscellaneous
Capitol Theatre
Arrow Press Square Shopping Center, 50 W 200 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Besides hosting concerts & Broadway plays, this 1913 landmark is home to Ballet West & Utah Opera.
Eccles Theater
131 Main St, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
Tower Theatre
876 E 900 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84105
Historic art-house cinema featuring new releases, cult classics & sing-alongs, plus a video library.
Broadway Centre Cinemas
111 Broadway, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
6-screen cinema featuring 1st-run foreign & indie films along with unique concessions & pizza.
Pioneer Theatre Company
The University of Utah, 300 1400 E #205, Salt Lake City, UT 84112
Professional company from 1962 presenting dramas, comedies & classics at the University of Utah.
Rose Wagner Performing Arts Center
138 Broadway, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
3-venue complex hosting dance & theater performances, the Sundance Film Festival & an art gallery.
Grand Theatre
1575 State St, Salt Lake City, UT 84115
Classy theater at Salt Lake Community College presenting films & live music & drama performances.
Kilby Court
748 W Kilby Ct, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Pint-sized, bare-bones music venue without age restrictions showcasing local & smaller touring acts.
The State Room
638 State St, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
Concert venue with a bar hosting touring acts in a cozy space with theater seats & a dance floor.
In the Venue
219 S 600 W, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
The Depot
The Gateway, 400 W S Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Modern concert venue & event center featuring touring bands & DJs in a historic Union Pacific depot.
Urban Lounge
241 500 E, Salt Lake City, UT 84102
Late-night concert venue featuring cocktails & nightly live performances in an intimate interior.
Garage on Beck
1199 Beck St, Salt Lake City, UT 84103
Auto repair shop transformed into a laid-back comfort-food haunt with live music & a garden patio.
The Shred Shed SLC
60 Exchange Pl, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
Natural History Museum of Utah
301 Wakara Way, Salt Lake City, UT 84108

The Natural History Museum of Utah is a museum located on the campus of the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, Utah, United States. The museum shows exhibits of natural history subjects, with an emphasis on Utah and the Intermountain West
Utah Museum of Fine Arts
The University of Utah, 410 Campus Center Dr, Salt Lake City, UT 84112

The Utah Museum of Fine Arts is the region\'s primary resource for culture and visual arts. It is located in the Marcia and John Price Museum Building in Salt Lake City, Utah on the University of Utah campus near Rice–Eccles Stadium
The Leonardo
209 E 500 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84111

The Leonardo, located in the heart of Salt Lake City, is a unique museum where visitors can explore the unexpected ways that science, technology, art, and creativity connect. The museum opened its doors on October 8, 2011
Off Broadway Theatre Inc.
272 Main St, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Intimate, established auditorium that puts on comedy shows, improv nights & Broadway-style musicals.
Settebello Pizzeria Napoletana
260 S 200 W, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Buzzy venue serving authentic Neapolitan pies along with salads, gelato, wine & beer in casual digs.
Bambara
202 Main St, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Inspired New American bistro serving seasonal fare, cocktails & fine wines in the hip Hotel Monaco.
BRIO Tuscan Grille
City Creek Center, 80 South Regent Street, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Warm, relaxed Italian eatery serving Tuscan-inspired grill fare, wine & cocktails.
The Copper Onion
111 East Broadway #170, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
Locally sourced New American fare, cocktails & brunch in a modern setting with plenty of buzz.
Blue Lemon
City Creek Center, 55 S W Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
Local counter-serve chain offering breakfast, sandwiches & New American entrees in a modern space.
Caffé Molise
55 100 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Art-filled trattoria serving Northern Italian fare & unique wines in cozy digs with a garden patio.
Blue Iguana
165 S W Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Casual Mexican eatery serving mole dishes along with burritos & margaritas in an eclectic setting.
Takashi
18 W Market St, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Japanese eatery & sushi bar featuring signature rolls & a big sake list in hip, contemporary digs.
Eva
317 Main St, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
Mediterranean-inspired eatery serving small plates & specialty cocktails in a stylish setting.
Red Rock Brewing Co
254 S 200 W, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
Lively brewpub offering beers & an array of New American fare in an industrial-chic setting.
